row.title: NCI Dictionary of Genetics Terms
row.field_short_title: NCI Dictionary of Genetics Terms
row.field_page_description: A dictionary of more than 150 genetics-related terms written for healthcare professionals. This resource was developed to support the comprehensive, evidence-based, peer-reviewed PDQ cancer genetics information summaries.
row.field_feature_card_description: A dictionary of more than 150 genetics-related terms written for healthcare professionals, developed to support the comprehensive, evidence-based, peer-reviewed PDQ cancer genetics information summaries.
row.field_list_description: A dictionary of more than 150 genetics-related terms written for healthcare professionals. This resource was developed to support the comprehensive, evidence-based, peer-reviewed PDQ cancer genetics information summaries.
row.field_browser_title: NCI Dictionary of Genetics Terms
row.field_card_title: NCI Dictionary of Genetics Terms
row.body: The NCI Dictionary of Genetics Terms contains technical definitions for more than 200 terms related to genetics. These definitions were developed by the PDQ® Cancer Genetics Editorial Board to support the evidence-based, peer-reviewed PDQ cancer genetics information summaries.

row.title: Find NCI-Supported Clinical Trials
row.field_short_title: Find NCI-Supported Clinical Trials
row.field_page_description: Find an NCI-supported clinical trial—and learn how to locate other research studies—that may be right for you or a loved one.
row.field_feature_card_description: Find an NCI-supported clinical trial—and learn how to locate other research studies—that may be right for you or a loved one.
row.field_list_description: Find an NCI-supported clinical trial—and learn how to locate other research studies—that may be right for you or a loved one.
row.field_browser_title: Find NCI-Supported Clinical Trials
row.field_card_title: Find NCI-Supported Clinical Trials
row.body:
NCI-supported clinical trials are those sponsored or otherwise financially supported by NCI. See our guide, Steps to Find a Clinical Trial, to learn about options for finding trials not included in NCI's collection.

Search Tip: For more search options, use our advanced search.

row.title: Find NCI-Supported Clinical Trials
row.field_short_title: Find NCI-Supported Clinical Trials
row.field_feature_card_description: Find an NCI-supported clinical trial—and learn how to locate other research studies—that may be right for you or a loved one.
row.field_browser_title: Find NCI-Supported Clinical Trials
row.field_card_title: Looking for a Clinical Trial?
row.body:
NCI-supported clinical trials are those sponsored or otherwise financially supported by NCI. See our guide, Steps to Find a Clinical Trial, to learn about options for finding trials not included in NCI's collection.

Search Tip: All fields are optional. Skip any items that are unknown or not applicable or try our basic search.

row.title: NCI Dictionary of Cancer Terms
row.field_short_title: NCI Dictionary of Cancer Terms
row.field_page_description: NCI's Dictionary of Cancer Terms provides easy-to-understand definitions for words and phrases related to cancer and medicine.
row.field_feature_card_description: Look up easy-to-understand definitions for words and phrases related to cancer and medicine.
row.field_list_description: NCI's Dictionary of Cancer Terms provides easy-to-understand definitions for words and phrases related to cancer and medicine.

row.field_card_title: NCI Dictionary of Cancer Terms

row.title: NCI Drug Dictionary
row.field_short_title: NCI Drug Dictionary
row.field_page_description: Find technical definitions and synonyms by letter for drugs/agents used to treat patients with cancer or conditions related to cancer. Each entry includes links to find associated clinical trials.
row.field_feature_card_description: Definitions and synonyms for drugs/agents used to treat patients with cancer or conditions related to cancer.
row.field_list_description: Find technical definitions and synonyms by letter for drugs/agents used to treat patients with cancer or conditions related to cancer. Each entry includes links to find associated clinical trials.
row.field_browser_title: NCI Drug Dictionary
row.field_card_title: NCI Drug Dictionary
row.body: The NCI Drug Dictionary contains technical definitions and synonyms for drugs/agents used to treat patients with cancer or conditions related to cancer. Each drug entry includes links to check for clinical trials listed in NCI's List of Cancer Clinical Trials.
